nodes.text: A Mandalorian female was the mother of Parja Bralor. A member of Clan Bralor, the woman was also the sister of the Cuy'val Dar training sergeant Rav Bralor.

Parja Bralor's mother was first introduced to Star Wars canon via a mention in the novel Republic Commando: True Colors, the third entry in the Republic Commando series authored by Karen Traviss, published October 30, 2007.
